readingMnemonic: You chase the scooter to that <kanji>distant</kanji> place, but then you see it heading for a lake. Oh good, it should be stopped by the water. But wait! In the distance you see your scooter drive onto a <reading>row</reading> (りょう) boat and... row itself through the water?! No!!
meaningMnemonic: You got off your <radical>scooter</radical> to load some <radical>charcoal</radical> onto it, when it suddenly took off to a <kanji>distant</kanji> place! That's some powerful charcoal.
